name: Sanjay Kumar Sinha
description: With over 20 years of distinguished service in the government sector, Sanjay Kumar Sinha brings a wealth of experience, discipline, and strategic vision to the company. Now channeling his expertise into entrepreneurship, he is passionately building this venture from the ground up. Known for his strong industry network and leadership capabilities, he plays a pivotal role in driving growth, forging partnerships, and ensuring operational excellence.

name: Sangeeta Sinha
description: A lawyer by profession and an interior designer by passion, Sangeeta Sinha brings a rare blend of creativity, precision, and entrepreneurial spirit to the company. With a deep understanding of aesthetics, structure, and strategy, she leads the brand with a vision to offer thoughtfully curated products and services across diverse categories. Her multifaceted expertise drives innovation, trust, and quality in everything we do.
